TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileLogTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

summary.span: 提供簡單的接聽程式，將記錄輸出導向到檔案。

span.span: Provides a simple listener that directs logging output to file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供自動的維護功能，可封存記錄檔，如有需要每日或每個應用程式的基礎。The class provides automated maintenance capabilities to archive log files as needed, on a daily or per-application basis. 此自動封存功能有助於減少維護責任的開發人員和管理員。This automatic archival functionality helps reduce the maintenance responsibilities of developers and administrators. 執行個體可以加入至或從記錄到文字檔中的輸出重新導向的集合。An instance of can be added to the or collections to redirect output from logging to a text file. 此類別的執行個體也可以加入至`My.Application.Log`或`My.Log`（適用於 Web 應用程式） 在 Visual Basic 應用程式。Instances of this class can also be added to `My.Application.Log` or `My.Log` (for Web applications) in Visual Basic applications. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 My.Application.Log 寫入資訊](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.`For more information, see [Walkthrough: Changing Where My.Application.Log Writes Information](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/walkthrough-changing-where-my-application-log-writes-information.md)`.` 這個類別的主要功能如下：The main features of this class are: 1. *封存功能*。*Archival functionality*. 這個類別所產生的記錄檔會命名為根據的基底名稱和日期，以及數字，以區別記錄檔的後續版本中的記錄檔。The log files generated by this class are named according to the base name and the date, along with a number to distinguish the log file from successive versions of the log. 為需要建立新的記錄檔。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 是明確的檔案名稱形式`baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`version`].log，其中：The explicit form of the file name is `baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`version`].log, where: - `baseName`部分是基本的記錄檔名稱，由指定屬性。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp`組件的格式 」-YYYY-MM-DD"，，它會顯示何時是或。The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when is or . - 如果需要一個以上的記錄檔具有相同`baseName`並`dateStamp`，則`version`部分，正`Integer`，新增至檔案名稱。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `version` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name. 2. *多個類別執行個體*。*Multiple class instances*. 如果執行個體類別寫入正在使用中的檔案：If an instance of the class writes to a file that is in use: - 類別會共用檔案，如果它正由另一個執行個體相同的處理序中的類別。The class shares the file if it is being used by another instance of the class in the same process. - 類別會建立新的記錄檔，如果檔案正由另一個處理序，請使用下一個可用的名稱。The class creates a new log file using the next available name if the file is being used by another process. 3. *執行緒安全*。*Thread safety*. 類別是安全執行緒。The class is thread safe. 這可讓您安全地訊息寫入記錄檔從多個執行緒而不使用鎖定。This allows you to safely write messages to the log from multiple threads without using locks. **記錄檔位置****Log-File Location** - 屬性所接受列舉，來指定要寫入的記錄檔的一般目錄的其中一個。The property takes a enumeration to specify one of the typical directories to write the log file to. - 若要將記錄寫入另一個位置，設定至該位置的屬性。To write the log to another location, set the property to that location. **記錄檔名稱****Log-File Name** - 所指定的記錄檔的基底名稱屬性。The base name for the log file is specified by the property. - 可讀取目前的記錄檔名稱屬性。The current log file name can be read from the property. 在檔案系統，它被衍生自數個其他屬性和記錄檔的目前狀態。It is derived from several other properties and the current state of the logs in the file system. **記錄維護****Log Maintenance** - 建立新的記錄檔的最小頻率由屬性。The minimum frequency for creating new log files is determined by the property. 當這個值是或是、 每日或每週至少一次建立新的記錄檔和日期戳記就會合併至名稱。When the value is or , a new log file is created at least once every day or week, and a date stamp is incorporated into the name. - 記錄檔的大小上限 （以位元組為單位） 由屬性。The maximum size (in bytes) of the log file is determined by the property. 如果記錄檔大小超過此大小，其他訊息寫入記錄檔會捨棄，取決於 屬性中擲回例外狀況。If the log file size exceeds this size, additional messages written to the log are discarded and, depending on the property, an exception is thrown. - 屬性會決定必須可使用多少可用空間 （以位元組為單位）。The property determines how much free space (in bytes) must be available. 這有助於確保類別將不會取用所有可用磁碟空間。This helps ensure that the class will not consume all available disk space. 使用屬性來指定記錄檔的行為，當有將小於個位元組可用。Use the property to specify the behavior of log writes when there are less than bytes free. **記錄檔的輸出設定****Log-File Output Settings** - 屬性會指定是否基礎資料流應該會自動清除之後每次寫入記錄檔。The property specifies whether the underlying stream should be flushed automatically after each write to the log file. - 屬性會指定是否要將訊息附加至目前的記錄檔，如果允許，或將它們寫入至新的記錄檔。The property specifies whether to append messages to the current log file, if allowed, or write them to a new log file. - 屬性會指定要用於分隔記錄訊息內欄位的字串。The property specifies the string to use for delimiting the fields within a log message. - 屬性會指定要建立新的記錄檔時使用的編碼方式。The property specifies the encoding to use when creating a new log file. **記錄檔輸出****Log-File Output** - 和方法會將訊息寫入記錄檔。The and methods write messages to the log file. 這些方法會檢查屬性，以及任何現有的記錄檔具有相同的基底名稱，以判斷是否應該建立新的記錄檔。These methods check the property, along with any existing logs with the same base name to determine if a new log should be created. - 方法排清目前在記錄檔的輸出緩衝區中的任何訊息。The method flushes any messages currently in the output buffer to the log file. - 方法會關閉記錄檔，以便可供其他處理序。The method closes the log file so that it can be used by other processes. **啟用輸出****Enabling Output** 您必須啟用追蹤或偵錯要使用的追蹤接聽項。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a trace listener. 下列語法是特定的編譯器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果您使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 以外的編譯器時，請參閱編譯器的文件。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要啟用偵錯 C# 中，新增`/d:DEBUG`旗標，當您編譯程式碼，或者您可以新增時，編譯器命令列以`#define DEBUG`至檔案頂端。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，新增`/d:DEBUG=True`至編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要啟用 C# 中的追蹤，請新增`/d:TRACE`旗標來編譯程式碼，或新增時，才會進行編譯器命令列`#define TRACE`至檔案頂端。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，新增`/d:TRACE=True`至編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要設定將接聽程式的層級，編輯您的應用程式的組態檔。To set the level of your listener, edit the configuration file for your application. 在此檔案中，您可以加入接聽程式、 設定其類型和其參數、 移除接聽程式，或清除先前設定的應用程式的所有接聽程式。Within this file, you can add a listener, set its type and set its parameters, remove a listener, or clear all the listeners previously set by the application. 組態檔的格式應該類似下列的範例。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. 針對要執行此範例中，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). ```xml ```

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並設定名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會設定的執行個體名稱FileLogTraceListener 的類別。This method sets the instance name of the class to FileLogTraceListener. 您可以存取執行個體名稱，透過屬性。You can access the instance name through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name of the instance object.

summary.span: 使用提供的名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the supplied name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會設定的執行個體名稱類別來`name`。This method sets the instance name of the class to `name`. 您可以存取執行個體名稱，以為屬性。You can access the instance name thought the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Append { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Append : bool with get, set

summary.span: 判斷是否要將輸出附加至目前的檔案，或將其寫入新檔案。

span.span: Determines whether to append the output to the current file or write it to a new file.

value.span: ，如果為 表示會將輸出附加至目前的檔案，如果為 則表示會將輸出寫入新檔案。

span.span: , with indicating that the output is appended to the current file, and indicating that output is written to a new file.

value.span: 這個屬性的預設設定為 。

span.span: The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`False`，輸出會寫入到新的檔案。When the property is `False`, the output is written to a new file. 若屬性是`True`，將輸出附加至目前的檔案，除非：When the property is `True`, the output is appended to the current file, unless: - 輸出檔案已被另一個處理序鎖定。The output file is locked by another process. 在此情況下，新的記錄檔使用版本號碼，就會合併至建立名稱。In this situation, a new log file is created with a version number that is incorporated into the name. - 目前的檔案大小大於什麼屬性允許。The current file size is greater than what the property allows. 在此情況下，額外的訊息會捨棄並視 屬性中擲回例外狀況。In this situation, additional messages are discarded and, depending on the property, an exception is thrown. - 現有的檔案名稱是根據所指定的記錄建立排程過期屬性。The existing file name is out of date according to the log-creation schedule specified by the property. 在此情況下，建立新的記錄檔和日期戳記就會合併至名稱。In this situation, a new log file is created and the date stamp is incorporated into the name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoFlush { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoFlush : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指出對記錄檔資料流的寫入過程是否會清除緩衝區。

span.span: Indicates whether or not the writing to the log file stream flushes the buffer.

value.span: ，如果為 表示會在每次寫入後清除資料流，否則會緩衝記錄項目並且以更有效率的方式寫入。

span.span: , with indicating that the stream is flushed after every write; otherwise the log entries are buffered and written more efficiently.

value.span: 這個屬性的預設設定為 。

span.span: The default setting for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `False`設定屬性會提供大部分的應用程式的最佳效能，因為它是更有效率的方式一次將多個訊息寫入記錄檔。The `False` setting for the property provides the best performance for most applications, because it is more efficient to write multiple messages to the log file at one time. 您可以使用方法，以排清目前在記錄檔中的任何訊息的輸出緩衝區。You can use the method to flush any messages currently in the log file's output buffer. 您也可以使用方法，這個方法會隱含地關閉記錄檔之前清除資料流。You can also use the method, which implicitly flushes the stream before closing the log file.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BaseFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BaseFileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定記錄檔的主檔名，該名稱是用來建立完整的記錄檔名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the base name for the log files, which is used to create the full log-file name.

value.span: 記錄檔的主檔名。

span.span: The base name for the log files.

value.span: 預設為應用程式的產品名稱。

span.span: The default is the application's product name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定的基底名稱的記錄檔，類別寫入。The property determines the base name for the log files that the class writes to. 屬性可讓目前的完整記錄檔名稱。The property gives the current full log-file name. 它是根據記錄檔路徑、 的基底名稱、 日期和數字，以區分它與不同版本的記錄檔中產生。It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log. 為需要建立新的記錄檔。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 完整的記錄檔名稱的明確形式`path` \\ `baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`].log，其中The explicit form of the full log file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where - `path`組件由屬性，而如果該屬性值設定為，則屬性。The `path` part is determined by the property and, if that property value is set to , the property. - `baseName`部分是基本的記錄檔名稱，由指定屬性。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp`組件的格式 」-YYYY-MM-DD"，，它會顯示何時設為或。The `dateStamp` part has the format "YYYY-MM-DD", and it is shown when is set to or . - 如果需要一個以上的記錄檔具有相同`baseName`並`dateStamp`，則`iteration`部分，正`Integer`，新增至檔案名稱。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.

summary.span: 關閉目前記錄檔的基礎資料流，並釋放與目前資料流關聯的任何資源。

span.span: Closes the underlying stream for the current log file and releases any resources associated with the current stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要呼叫方法明確地因為類別管理的基礎資料流。You do not need to call the method explicitly, because the class manages the underlying steam.

member this.CustomLocation : string with get, set

summary.span: 當 屬性設定為 時，取得或設定記錄檔目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the log file directory when the property is set to .

value.span: ，這是記錄檔目錄的名稱。

span.span: , which is the name of the log-file directory.

value.span: 這個屬性的預設值是使用者的應用程式資料目錄。

span.span: The default setting for this property is the user's directory for application data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定，它也會設定屬性設。When the property is set, it also sets the property to . 屬性將會擲回例外狀況，如果目錄不能解析。The property will throw an exception if the directory cannot be resolved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Delimiter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Delimiter : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來分隔記錄訊息內欄位的分隔符號 (Delimiter)。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter used to delimit fields within a log message.

value.span: ，這是用來分隔記錄訊息內之欄位的分隔符號。

span.span: , which is the delimiter used for fields within a log message.

value.span: 這個屬性的預設值為 TAB 字元。

span.span: The default setting for this property is the TAB character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您變更預設的分隔符號。The property allows you to change the default delimiter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption DiskSpaceExhaustedBehavior { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::DiskSpaceExhaustedOption value); };

summary.span: 決定當寫入記錄檔而可用的磁碟空間少於 屬性所指定的空間時，所要執行的動作。

span.span: Determines what to do when writing to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the property.

value.span: 決定當寫入記錄檔而可用的磁碟空間少於 屬性所指定的空間時，或是記錄檔大小大於 屬性所允許的大小時，所要執行的動作。

span.span: Determines what to do when attempting to write to the log file and there is less free disk space available than specified by the property, or if the log file size is greater than what the property allows.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，如果沒有足夠的保留的磁碟空間，會以無訊息方式捨棄的記錄訊息。When the property is set to , the log messages are silently discarded if there is not enough reserved disk space. 這是預設行為，而且它會防止從失敗的磁碟空間不足時的簡單應用程式。This is the default behavior, and it prevents simple applications from failing if the disk gets too full. 更穩固的應用程式可以設定屬性，以，並新增`Try...Catch`寫入記錄檔的所有程式碼周圍的區塊。More robust applications can set the property to , and add `Try...Catch` blocks around all code that writes to the log.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: releases both managed and unmanaged resources; releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 關閉基礎資料流，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Closes the underlying stream and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `disposing` 參數為 `True` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `True`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。這個方法會呼叫基底類別方法， 。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . This method calls the method of the base class, .

value.span: 此屬性的預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時將文字附加至現有的記錄檔，而不是所指定的編碼方式中使用該檔案的編碼方式屬性。When appending text to an existing log file, the encoding for that file is used instead of the encoding specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將所有緩衝的資料寫入目前的記錄檔。Use the method to write all buffered data to the current log file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FullLogFileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FullLogFileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的完整記錄檔名稱。

span.span: Gets the current full log-file name.

value.span: ，這是目前的完整記錄檔名稱。

span.span: , which is the current full log-file name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓目前的完整記錄檔名稱。The property gives the current full log-file name. 它是根據記錄檔路徑、 的基底名稱、 日期和數字，以區分它與不同版本的記錄檔中產生。It is generated according to the log path, the base name, the date, and a number to distinguish it from different versions of the log. 為需要建立新的記錄檔。New log files are created on an as-needed basis. 完整的記錄檔名稱的明確形式`path` \\ `baseName`[-`dateStamp`] [-`iteration`].log，其中：The explicit form of the full log-file name is `path`\\`baseName`[-`dateStamp`][-`iteration`].log, where: - `path`組件由屬性，而如果該屬性值設定為，則屬性。The `path` part is determined by the property and, if that property value is set to , the property. - `baseName`部分是基本的記錄檔名稱，由指定屬性。The `baseName` part is the fundamental log name, specified by the property. - `dateStamp`組件有格式為 YYYY-MM-DD，，而且它會顯示何時是或。The `dateStamp` part has the format YYYY-MM-DD, and it is shown when is or . - 如果需要一個以上的記錄檔具有相同`baseName`並`dateStamp`，則`iteration`部分，正`Integer`，新增至檔案名稱。If more than one log file is needed with the same `baseName` and `dateStamp`, the `iteration` part, a positive `Integer`, is added to the file name.

Protected Overrides Function GetSupportedAttributes () As String()
abstract member GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[] override this.GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[]

summary.span: 取得追蹤接聽項所支援的自訂 XML 組態屬性。

span.span: Gets the custom XML configuration attributes supported by the trace listener.

returns.span: 陣列，含有這個接聽程式可辨認的 XML 組態屬性。

span.span: array containing the XML configuration attributes recognized by this listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂屬性可用來控制行為的執行個體的 XML 組態檔中類別。The custom attributes for the can be used in the XML configuration file for controlling the behavior of an instance of the class. 使用任何其他屬性，會造成組態例外狀況。Using any other attribute causes a configuration exception.

member this.IncludeHostName : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指出記錄電腦的主機名稱是否應該包含在輸出中。

span.span: Indicates whether or not the host name of the logging machine should be included in the output.

value.span: 如果應該包含主機識別項則使用 ，否則使用 。

span.span: Use if the host identifier should be included; otherwise use .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定的行為和方法。Use the property to configure the behavior of the and methods.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation Location { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileLocation value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定記錄檔的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets location for the log files.

value.span: ，這是記錄檔的位置。

span.span: , which is the location for the log file.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用屬性設為其中一個預先定義的路徑，取決於設定的記錄檔路徑列舉值。Use the property to set the log path to one of the predefined paths, determined by the enumeration values. |**位置值****Location value**|**路徑****Path**| |------------------------|--------------| ||使用格式的所有使用者之間共用的應用程式資料路徑：The path for the application data that is shared among all users, with the format:

`BasePath`\\`CompanyName`\\`ProductName`\\`ProductVersion`

一般值`BasePath`是：A typical value for `BasePath` is:

C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application DataC:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data

值`CompanyName`， `ProductName`，和`ProductVersion`來自組件。The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come from the assembly.| ||啟動應用程式的可執行檔路徑。The path for the executable file that started the application.| ||使用者 （格式） 的應用程式資料路徑：The path for the application data of a user, with the format:

`BasePath`\\`CompanyName`\\`ProductName`\\`ProductVersion`

一般值`BasePath`是：A typical value for `BasePath` is:

C:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application DataC:\Documents and Settings\\`username`\Application Data

值`CompanyName`， `ProductName`，和`ProductVersion`會形成組件。The values of `CompanyName`, `ProductName`, and `ProductVersion` come form the assembly.| ||目前的系統暫存資料夾的路徑。The path of the current system's temporary folder.| ||如果指定的字串不清空，然後使用它做為路徑，否則採用使用者的應用程式資料路徑。If the string specified by is not empty, then use it as the path; otherwise use the path for the application data of a user.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption LogFileCreationSchedule { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::LogFileCreationScheduleOption value); };

summary.span: 決定要包含在記錄檔名稱中的日期。

span.span: Determines which date to include in the names of the log files.

value.span: 指出要包含在記錄檔名稱中的日期。

span.span: This indicates which date to include in the log-file names.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 指派其中一個列舉值來屬性來指定要在記錄檔的名稱中包含日期。Assign one of the enumeration values to the property to specify which date to include in the names of the log files. 日期的格式為 YYYY-MM-DD 的-The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD. 如需格式的記錄檔名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on the format of the log file name, see . |**LogFileCreationSchedule 值****LogFileCreationSchedule value**|**日期的記錄檔名稱****Date in the log file name**| |---------------------------------------|-----------------------------------| ||將目前的日期包含在記錄檔名稱中。Include the current date in the log file name.| ||不要在記錄檔名稱中包含日期。Do not include the date in the log file name.| ||在記錄檔名稱中包含當週的第一天。Include the first day of the current week in the log file name.

一週開始於星期六。The week starts on Saturday.|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaxFileSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaxFileSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定允許的記錄檔大小最大值 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowed size of the log file, in bytes.

value.span: 這是允許的記錄檔大小最大值 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: This is the maximum allowed log-file size, in bytes.
The default value is 5000000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來確定該記錄檔不會變得太大。Use this property to make sure that the log files do not grow too large. 如果記錄檔大小 （以位元組為單位） 大於此屬性的值然後當類別嘗試將訊息寫入記錄檔，會捨棄該訊息和失敗是無訊息或例外狀況會擲回的值而定屬性。If the log file size (in bytes) is greater than the value of this property, then when the class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the property. 否則，訊息寫入記錄檔，（以位元組為單位） 的可用磁碟空間數量小於。Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than .

exception.span: 當這個屬性設定為小於 1000 的值時。

span.span: When this property is set to a value less than 1000.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long ReserveDiskSpace { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.ReserveDiskSpace : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定將訊息寫入記錄檔前所需的可用磁碟空間總數 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of free disk space, in bytes, necessary before messages can be written to the log file.

value.span: 這是所需的可用磁碟空間總數。

span.span: This is the amount of free disk space necessary.
The default value is 10000000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來確定該記錄檔不完全填滿磁碟。Use this property to make sure that the log files do not completely fill the disk. 如果數量的可用磁碟空間 （以位元組為單位） 小於此屬性的值然後當類別嘗試將訊息寫入記錄檔，會捨棄該訊息和失敗是無訊息或例外狀況會擲回的值而定 屬性。If the amount of free disk space (in bytes) is less than the value of this property, then when the class attempts to write a message to the log, the message is discarded and the failure is either silent or an exception is thrown depending on the value of the property. 否則，訊息會寫入記錄檔，如果記錄檔大小 （以位元組為單位） 大於。Otherwise, the message is written to the log, if the log file size (in bytes) is greater than .

exception.span: 當這個屬性設定為小於 0 的值時。

span.span: When this property is set to a value less than 0.

summary.span: 將追蹤資料寫入輸出檔。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不適合由應用程式程式碼呼叫。 methods are not intended to be called by application code. 會呼叫這些方法的成員， ，和類別將追蹤資料寫入至輸出。These methods are called by members of the , , and classes to write trace data to output.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, data As Object)
public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::Object ^ data);

abstract member TraceData : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * obj -> unit override this.TraceData : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * obj -> unit

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 物件，包含目前處理程序識別碼、執行緒識別碼與堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.name: source
param.span: 叫用這個方法之追蹤來源的名稱。

span.span: A name of the trace source that invoked this method.
One of the enumeration values.
A numeric identifier for the event.
The trace data to emit.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件，及事件資訊至輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法：This method: 1. 格式化輸出的資料和內容資訊。Formats the data and context information for output. 2. 若有需要，請建立新的記錄檔。Creates a new log file, if necessary. 3. 將資訊寫入記錄檔。Writes the information to the log file. 如需有關如何建立新的記錄檔的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on creating new log files, see . 下表列出的輸出欄位中出現的順序。The following table lists the output fields in the order they appear. 分隔欄位的字串，屬性指定，後面接著行結束字元。The fields are delimited by the string that the property specifies, and are followed by a line terminator. |**欄位****Field**|**輸出的條件****Output condition**|**描述****Description**| |---------------|--------------------------|---------------------| |`source`|永遠Always|`name` 的值。The value of `name`.| |`severity`|永遠Always|列舉值名稱`eventType`。The enumeration-value name of `eventType`.| |`id`|永遠Always|`id` 的字串表示。The string representation of `id`.| |`message`|永遠Always|`data` 的字串表示。The string representation of `data`.| |`callStack`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`CorrelationID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`DateTime`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ProcessID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ThreadID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`Timestamp`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`HostName`|當屬性是`True`。When the property is `True`.|電腦的名稱。The name of the computer.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法：This method: 1. 將格式化輸出的資料和內容資訊Formats the data and context information for output, 2. 如有必要，建立新的記錄檔Creates a new log file, if necessary, 3. 將資訊寫入記錄檔。Writes the information to the log file. 如需有關如何建立新的記錄檔的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on creating new log files, see . 下表列出在其出現的順序中的輸出欄位。This table lists the output fields in the order they appear. 分隔欄位的字串，屬性指定，後面接著行結束字元。The fields are delimited by the string that the property specifies, and are followed by a line terminator. |**欄位****Field**|**輸出的條件****Output condition**|**描述****Description**| |---------------|--------------------------|---------------------| |`source`|永遠Always|`name` 的值。The value of `name`.| |`severity`|永遠Always|列舉值名稱`eventType`。The enumeration-value name of `eventType`.| |`id`|永遠Always|`id` 的字串表示。The string representation of `id`.| |`message`|永遠Always|字串，其中包含每個項目中的字串表示法`data`，以每個分隔。The string consisting of the string representation of each element in `data`, each separated by .| |`callStack`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`CorrelationID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`DateTime`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ProcessID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ThreadID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`Timestamp`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`HostName`|當屬性是`True`。When the property is `True`.|電腦的名稱。The name of the computer.|

A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: format
param.span: 包含零或多個格式項目的格式字串，它與 args 陣列中的物件相對應。

span.span: A format string that contains zero or more format items, which correspond to objects in the args array.

param.name: args
param.span: 陣列，含有零或多個要格式化的物件。

span.span: An array containing zero or more objects to format.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、格式化的物件陣列，及事件資訊至輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法：This method: 1. 格式化輸出的資料和內容資訊。Formats the data and context information for output. 2. 建立新新的記錄檔，如有必要。Creates a new a new log file, if necessary. 3. 將資訊寫入記錄檔。Writes the information to the log file. 如需有關如何建立新的記錄檔的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on creating new log file, see . 下表列出的輸出欄位，以其出現的順序。This table lists the output fields in the order in which they appear. 分隔欄位的字串，屬性指定，後面接著行結束字元。The fields are delimited by the string that the property specifies, and followed by a line terminator. |**欄位****Field**|**輸出的條件****Output condition**|**描述****Description**| |---------------|--------------------------|---------------------| |`source`|永遠Always|`name` 的值。The value of `name`.| |`severity`|永遠Always|列舉值名稱`eventType`。The enumeration-value name of `eventType`.| |`id`|永遠Always|`id` 的字串表示。The string representation of `id`.| |`message`|永遠Always|中的資料`args`格式化`format`字串和使用的字串轉換的文化特性而異。The data in `args` formatted with the `format` string and using the invariant culture for string conversions.| |`callStack`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`CorrelationID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`DateTime`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ProcessID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`ThreadID`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|屬性`eventCache`。The property of `eventCache`.| |`Timestamp`|當旗標設定屬性。When the flag is set in the property.|字串表示法屬性`eventCache`。The string representation of the property of `eventCache`. 而異的文化特性用於字串轉換。The invariant culture is used for the string conversion.| |`HostName`|當屬性是`True`。When the property is `True`.|電腦的名稱。The name of the computer.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Write (message As String)
abstract member Write : string -> unit override this.Write : string -> unit

span.span: The custom message to write.

summary.span: 將訊息逐字寫入磁碟，但不含任何其他內容資訊。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message to disk, without any additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將特定訊息寫入記錄檔，而不需要任何其他內容資訊。The method writes a specific message to the log file, without any additional context information. 使用其中一個記錄輸出中包含的內容資訊的方法。Use the one of the methods to include the context information in the log output.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteLine(string message) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteLine (message As String)
abstract member WriteLine : string -> unit override this.WriteLine : string -> unit

span.span: The custom message to write.

summary.span: 將訊息逐字寫入磁碟，後面接著目前的行結束字元，但不含任何其他內容資訊。

span.span: Writes a verbatim message to disk, followed by the current line terminator, without any additional context information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將特定訊息寫入記錄檔，而不需要任何其他內容資訊。The method writes a specific message to the log file, without any additional context information. 使用其中一個記錄輸出中包含的內容資訊的方法。Use the one of the methods to include the context information in the log output.
